top_hat.name: Top Hat
top_hat.desc: A tall, black top hat adorned with intricate brass gears and cogs, giving it a sophisticated yet mechanical look.

steam_breath.name: Steam Breath
steam_breath.desc: A powerful burst of scalding steam emitted from the mouth, capable of causing severe burns.

fire_breath.name: Fire Breath
fire_breath.desc: A fierce jet of flames expelled from the mouth, incinerating anything in its path.

brass_goggles.name: Brass Goggles
brass_goggles.desc: A pair of sturdy brass goggles with adjustable lenses, perfect for protecting the eyes from debris and enhancing vision.

monocle.name: Monocle
monocle.desc: Elegant clockwork monocle with brass frame

energy_shield_generator.name: Energy Shield Generator
energy_shield_generator.desc: Glowing blue orb with pipes going in and out of it

amored_plating.name: Armored Plating
amored_plating.desc: Bulky steel plates attached all around the chest

steam_powered_jetpack.name: Steam-Powered Jetpack
steam_powered_jetpack.desc: A gleaming brass and steel contraption, the steam-powered jetpack sports twin exhaust vents that emit billowing plumes of white vapor.

wings.name: Wings
wings.desc: Razor sharp metal feathers hanging from a shiny steel frame attached to the back of the torso

tesla_coil.name: Tesla Coil
tesla_coil.desc: Three rings surrounding a thick metal rod giving off a cold blue glow

hammer.name: Hammer
hammer.desc: A large metal hammer positioned where the hand was

gatling_gun.desc: a Small gun withe a tube going around the hand and into an ammunition box

rocket_launcher.name: Rocket Launcher
rocket_launcher.desc: A large and heavy tube attached around the upper side of the arm

steam_powered_canon.name: Steam-Powered Canon
steam_powered_canon.desc: A large tube with clear pipes filled with steam going into it

steampowered legs.name: Steampowered legs
steampowered legs.desc: powerful legs with tubes full of steam pulsing all over it

razor blades.name: Razor Blades
razor blades.desc: Sharp rotating blades for cutting through obstacles.

saw blades.name: Saw Blades
saw blades.desc: Circular saw blades for slicing through tough materials.

silver Lining.name: Silver Lining
silver Lining.desc: Elegant silver trim for added style.

copper_tubing.name: Copper Tubing
copper_tubing.desc: Durable copper tubes for enhanced durability.

gold plating.name: Gold Plating
gold plating.desc: Luxurious gold coating for a premium look.
